uri.description: The URI (or IRI) of the MDL module.
uri.gltf_detailedDescription: The URI (or IRI) of the MDL module.  Relative paths are relative to the current glTF asset.  Instead of referencing an external file, this field **MAY** contain a `data:`-URI. This field **MUST NOT** be defined when `bufferView` is defined.

bufferView.description: The ID of the bufferView containing the MDL module. This field **MUST NOT** be defined if `uri` is defined.

modulePath.description: Relative path of the module. This field **MUST** be defined when `bufferView` is defined or `uri` contains a data-URI.
